description:
**Problem**
Phase 4 tests need mutation request factories and receipt comparison helpers.

**Context**
- REALTIME_PLAN.md ยง18: idempotency mapping/receipts
- Blocks Phase 4 testing bead

**Design**
Create test infrastructure:
- Mutation request builders (bead_upsert, dep_add, note_append)
- Request canonicalization helpers for request_sha256
- DurabilityReceipt comparison utilities
- Idempotency test harness: send request, get receipt, retry, verify same receipt

**Acceptance**
- [ ] tests/fixtures/mutation.rs with request builders
- [ ] tests/fixtures/receipt.rs with receipt comparison helpers
- [ ] Builders support all TxnDeltaV1 operation types
- [ ] cargo test fixtures::mutation passes

**Files:** tests/fixtures/mutation.rs (new), tests/fixtures/receipt.rs (new)
title: Phase 4 test infrastructure: mutation request factories
